note.p: Career: H O Jones Lecturer in Physical Chemistry in the University of Cambridge; Fellow of Trinity Hall; John Humphrey Plummer Professor of Colloidal Science, Cambridge (1931-1946); Fullerian Professor and Director of the Day-Faraday laboratory at the Royal Institution (1946-1949); Professor of Physical Chemistry, King's College, London (1950-1955)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DSB vol 18 pp 738-743
AssocMaterial: CSAC 62/6/78. Papers deposited in the Royal Institution
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1976 vol 22 pp 381-413, plate, by D D Eley
References: N N Greenwood and J A Spink, 'An antipodean laboratory of remarkable distinction' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 85-105
